snippet.title: MLB playoffs 2013: Pirates cruise to Wild Card Game victory over Reds
snippet.description:
Tuesday October 1, 2013 10:15 pm
Russell Martin homered twice, Marlon Byrd also homered, and the Pittsburgh Pirates advanced to the National League Division Series with a 6-2 victory over the Cincinnati Reds in the NL Wild Card Game on Tuesday night at a sold-out PNC Park. Playing in the franchise's first postseason game since 1992, the Pirates knocked out Reds starter Johnny Cueto in the fourth inning. Byrd and Martin homered in the second to give the Pirates a 2-0 lead. MORE: Postseason schedule | Photo gallery Byrd's homer ...
